content.question: A movement that began in Italy as a reaction to the impact of globalization on the quality of daily urban life promotes

choices.label: smart growth, which concentrates growth in compact urban centers to avoid sprawl
counterurbanization, which decreases the need for transportation infrastructure
edge cities, which improve regional economies
slow-growth cities, which emphasize long-standing cultural traditions

content.answer: slow-growth cities, which emphasize long-standing cultural traditions
